newsitem.title: GERMANY: Bundesbank sets 14-day repo tender at fixed 3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bundesbank sets 14-day repo tender at fixed 3 pct.

text.p: The Bundesbank said on Tuesday it was setting a tender for 14-day securities repurchase funds, offering banks liquidity at a fixed rate of 3.00 percent.
Funds will be credited to accounts tomorrow, Wednesday, and the securities have to be repurchased on November 27.
A 68.0 billion mark facility set at a fixed three percent interest rate expires on Wednesday.
The repo rate has been fixed at three percent since late August.
